plot outline: Watch the full movie, Vasanthiyum Lakshmiyum Pinne Njaanum, only on Eros Now. Vakkil Vasudev is a 1999 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Vinayan and produced by Kabeer, Latheef, Vindhyan. The film stars Kalabhavan Mani, Kaveri, Praveena and Saikumar in lead roles. The film had musical score by Mohan Sithara.
title: Vasanthiyum Lakshmiyum Pinne Njaanum

Vakkil Vasudev is a 1999 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Vinayan and produced by Kabeer, Latheef, Vindhyan. The film stars Kalabhavan Mani, Kaveri, Praveena and Saikumar in lead roles. The film had musical score by Mohan Sithara.
